text: Dolicholatirus spiceri is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. The species is named in honour of William Webb Spicer. (See p. 39.) ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1876
title: Dolicholatirus spiceri
